revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__
== Notes ==
Most Blacksmith shops also have [[Weaponsmith]] and [[Armorer]] NPCs. 

[[Bulk Order Deed]]s can be gotten from Blacksmiths.
== Locations ==
*Blacksmith
**[[Britain]](x3), [[Buccaneer's Den]], [[Jhelom]](x3), [[Minoc]], [[Moonglow]], [[Nujel'm]](x2), [[Serpent's Hold]], [[Skara Brae]], [[Trinsic]], [[Vesper]]
*Weaponsmith and Armorer (no Blacksmith)
**[[Britain]](x3), [[Cove]], [[Jhelom]](x3), [[Minoc]], [[Moonglow]], [[Ocllo]], [[Serpent's Hold]], [[Skara Brae]](x2), [[Trinsic]], [[Vesper]],
